scripts.text:
WITH
SQ_PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage AS (
	SELECT
		pif_42gq_wc2_stage_id AS PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage_id,
		pif_symbol AS PIF_SYMBOL,
		pif_policy_number AS PIF_POLICY_NUMBER,
		pif_module AS PIF_MODULE,
		ipfcgq_rec_length AS IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH,
		ipfcgq_action_code AS IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE,
		ipfcgq_file_id AS IPFCGQ_FILE_ID,
		ipfcgq_segment_id AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID,
		ipfcgq_segment_level_code AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE,
		ipfcgq_segment_part_code AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE,
		ipfcgq_sub_part_code AS IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE,
		ipfcgq_year_of_loss AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS,
		ipfcgq_month_of_loss AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS,
		ipfcgq_day_of_loss AS IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS,
		ipfcgq_loss_occurence AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE,
		ipfcgq_loss_claimant AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT,
		ipfcgq_claimant_use_code AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE,
		ipfcgq_claimant_use_seq AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ,
		ipfcgq_year_process AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS,
		ipfcgq_month_process AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS,
		ipfcgq_day_process AS IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS,
		ipfcgq_year_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_month_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_day_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_sequence_change_entry AS IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY,
		ipfcgq_segment_status AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS,
		ipfcgq_entry_operator AS IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR,
		ipfcgq_claim_reason AS IPFCGQ_CLAIM_REASON,
		ipfcgq_value_date AS IPFCGQ_VALUE_DATE,
		ipfcgq_resolved_date AS IPFCGQ_RESOLVED_DATE,
		ipfcgq_subrogation_code AS IPFCGQ_SUBROGATION_CODE,
		ipfcgq_wage_method AS IPFCGQ_WAGE_METHOD,
		ipfcgq_pre_inj_wage AS IPFCGQ_PRE_INJ_WAGE,
		ipfcgq_post_inj_wage AS IPFCGQ_POST_INJ_WAGE,
		ipfcgq_last_week_benefit AS IPFCGQ_LAST_WEEK_BENEFIT,
		ipfcgq_doctor_visits AS IPFCGQ_DOCTOR_VISITS,
		ipfcgq_hospital_days AS IPFCGQ_HOSPITAL_DAYS,
		ipfcgq_apportion_condition AS IPFCGQ_APPORTION_CONDITION,
		ipfcgq_apportionment AS IPFCGQ_APPORTIONMENT,
		ipfcgq_payment_method AS IPFCGQ_PAYMENT_METHOD,
		ipfcgq_disposition_type AS IPFCGQ_DISPOSITION_TYPE,
		ipfcgq_omit_from_unit_stat AS IPFCGQ_OMIT_FROM_UNIT_STAT,
		ipfcgq_value_condition AS IPFCGQ_VALUE_CONDITION,
		ipfcgq_prev_injury_extent AS IPFCGQ_PREV_INJURY_EXTENT,
		ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_1 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_1,
		ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_2 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_2,
		ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_3 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_3,
		ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_4 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_4,
		ipfcgq_indiv_rept_req AS IPFCGQ_INDIV_REPT_REQ,
		ipfcgq_joint_coverage_ind AS IPFCGQ_JOINT_COVERAGE_IND,
		ipfcgq_number_of_part78 AS IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78,
		ipfcgq_offset_onset_ind AS IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND,
		ipfcgq_date_hire AS IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE,
		ipfcgq_pms_future_use_gq AS IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ,
		ipfcgq_direct_reporting AS IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING,
		ipfcgq_cust_spl_use_gq AS IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ,
		ipfcgq_yr2000_cust_use AS IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE,
		inf_action,
		inf_timestamp,
		logical_flag,
		extract_date AS EXTRACT_DATE,
		as_of_date AS AS_OF_DATE,
		record_count AS RECORD_COUNT,
		source_system_id AS SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID
	FROM PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage
),
EXP_arch_PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage AS (
	SELECT
	PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage_id,
	PIF_SYMBOL,
	PIF_POLICY_NUMBER,
	PIF_MODULE,
	IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH,
	IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_FILE_ID,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS,
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS,
	IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS,
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE,
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT,
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ,
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS,
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS,
	IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS,
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY,
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS,
	IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR,
	IPFCGQ_CLAIM_REASON,
	IPFCGQ_VALUE_DATE,
	IPFCGQ_RESOLVED_DATE,
	IPFCGQ_SUBROGATION_CODE,
	IPFCGQ_WAGE_METHOD,
	IPFCGQ_PRE_INJ_WAGE,
	IPFCGQ_POST_INJ_WAGE,
	IPFCGQ_LAST_WEEK_BENEFIT,
	IPFCGQ_DOCTOR_VISITS,
	IPFCGQ_HOSPITAL_DAYS,
	IPFCGQ_APPORTION_CONDITION,
	IPFCGQ_APPORTIONMENT,
	IPFCGQ_PAYMENT_METHOD,
	IPFCGQ_DISPOSITION_TYPE,
	IPFCGQ_OMIT_FROM_UNIT_STAT,
	IPFCGQ_VALUE_CONDITION,
	IPFCGQ_PREV_INJURY_EXTENT,
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_1,
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_2,
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_3,
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_4,
	IPFCGQ_INDIV_REPT_REQ,
	IPFCGQ_JOINT_COVERAGE_IND,
	IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78,
	IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND,
	IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE,
	IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ,
	IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING,
	IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ,
	IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE,
	inf_action,
	inf_timestamp,
	logical_flag,
	EXTRACT_DATE,
	AS_OF_DATE,
	RECORD_COUNT,
	SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID,
	@{pipeline().parameters.WBMI_AUDIT_CONTROL_RUN_ID} AS AUDIT_ID_OP
	FROM SQ_PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage
),
arch_PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage AS (
	INSERT INTO arch_PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage
	(pif_42gq_wc2_stage_id, pif_symbol, pif_policy_number, pif_module, ipfcgq_rec_length, ipfcgq_action_code, ipfcgq_file_id, ipfcgq_segment_id, ipfcgq_segment_level_code, ipfcgq_segment_part_code, ipfcgq_sub_part_code, ipfcgq_year_of_loss, ipfcgq_month_of_loss, ipfcgq_day_of_loss, ipfcgq_loss_occurence, ipfcgq_loss_claimant, ipfcgq_claimant_use_code, ipfcgq_claimant_use_seq, ipfcgq_year_process, ipfcgq_month_process, ipfcgq_day_process, ipfcgq_year_change_entry, ipfcgq_month_change_entry, ipfcgq_day_change_entry, ipfcgq_sequence_change_entry, ipfcgq_segment_status, ipfcgq_entry_operator, ipfcgq_claim_reason, ipfcgq_value_date, ipfcgq_resolved_date, ipfcgq_subrogation_code, ipfcgq_wage_method, ipfcgq_pre_inj_wage, ipfcgq_post_inj_wage, ipfcgq_last_week_benefit, ipfcgq_doctor_visits, ipfcgq_hospital_days, ipfcgq_apportion_condition, ipfcgq_apportionment, ipfcgq_payment_method, ipfcgq_disposition_type, ipfcgq_omit_from_unit_stat, ipfcgq_value_condition, ipfcgq_prev_injury_extent, ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_1, ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_2, ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_3, ipfcgq_benefit_remarks_4, ipfcgq_indiv_rept_req, ipfcgq_joint_coverage_ind, ipfcgq_number_of_part78, ipfcgq_offset_onset_ind, ipfcgq_date_hire, ipfcgq_pms_future_use_gq, ipfcgq_direct_reporting, ipfcgq_cust_spl_use_gq, ipfcgq_yr2000_cust_use, inf_action, inf_timestamp, logical_flag, extract_date, as_of_date, record_count, source_system_id, audit_id)
	SELECT 
	PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage_id AS PIF_42GQ_WC2_STAGE_ID, 
	PIF_SYMBOL AS PIF_SYMBOL, 
	PIF_POLICY_NUMBER AS PIF_POLICY_NUMBER, 
	PIF_MODULE AS PIF_MODULE, 
	IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH AS IPFCGQ_REC_LENGTH, 
	IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE AS IPFCGQ_ACTION_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_FILE_ID AS IPFCGQ_FILE_ID, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_ID, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_LEVEL_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_PART_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE AS IPFCGQ_SUB_PART_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_OF_LOSS, 
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_OF_LOSS, 
	IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS AS IPFCGQ_DAY_OF_LOSS, 
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_OCCURENCE, 
	IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT AS IPFCGQ_LOSS_CLAIMANT, 
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ AS IPFCGQ_CLAIMANT_USE_SEQ, 
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_PROCESS, 
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_PROCESS, 
	IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS AS IPFCGQ_DAY_PROCESS, 
	IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_YEAR_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_MONTH_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_DAY_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY AS IPFCGQ_SEQUENCE_CHANGE_ENTRY, 
	IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS AS IPFCGQ_SEGMENT_STATUS, 
	IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR AS IPFCGQ_ENTRY_OPERATOR, 
	IPFCGQ_CLAIM_REASON AS IPFCGQ_CLAIM_REASON, 
	IPFCGQ_VALUE_DATE AS IPFCGQ_VALUE_DATE, 
	IPFCGQ_RESOLVED_DATE AS IPFCGQ_RESOLVED_DATE, 
	IPFCGQ_SUBROGATION_CODE AS IPFCGQ_SUBROGATION_CODE, 
	IPFCGQ_WAGE_METHOD AS IPFCGQ_WAGE_METHOD, 
	IPFCGQ_PRE_INJ_WAGE AS IPFCGQ_PRE_INJ_WAGE, 
	IPFCGQ_POST_INJ_WAGE AS IPFCGQ_POST_INJ_WAGE, 
	IPFCGQ_LAST_WEEK_BENEFIT AS IPFCGQ_LAST_WEEK_BENEFIT, 
	IPFCGQ_DOCTOR_VISITS AS IPFCGQ_DOCTOR_VISITS, 
	IPFCGQ_HOSPITAL_DAYS AS IPFCGQ_HOSPITAL_DAYS, 
	IPFCGQ_APPORTION_CONDITION AS IPFCGQ_APPORTION_CONDITION, 
	IPFCGQ_APPORTIONMENT AS IPFCGQ_APPORTIONMENT, 
	IPFCGQ_PAYMENT_METHOD AS IPFCGQ_PAYMENT_METHOD, 
	IPFCGQ_DISPOSITION_TYPE AS IPFCGQ_DISPOSITION_TYPE, 
	IPFCGQ_OMIT_FROM_UNIT_STAT AS IPFCGQ_OMIT_FROM_UNIT_STAT, 
	IPFCGQ_VALUE_CONDITION AS IPFCGQ_VALUE_CONDITION, 
	IPFCGQ_PREV_INJURY_EXTENT AS IPFCGQ_PREV_INJURY_EXTENT, 
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_1 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_1, 
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_2 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_2, 
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_3 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_3, 
	IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_4 AS IPFCGQ_BENEFIT_REMARKS_4, 
	IPFCGQ_INDIV_REPT_REQ AS IPFCGQ_INDIV_REPT_REQ, 
	IPFCGQ_JOINT_COVERAGE_IND AS IPFCGQ_JOINT_COVERAGE_IND, 
	IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78 AS IPFCGQ_NUMBER_OF_PART78, 
	IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND AS IPFCGQ_OFFSET_ONSET_IND, 
	IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE AS IPFCGQ_DATE_HIRE, 
	IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ AS IPFCGQ_PMS_FUTURE_USE_GQ, 
	IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING AS IPFCGQ_DIRECT_REPORTING, 
	IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ AS IPFCGQ_CUST_SPL_USE_GQ, 
	IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE AS IPFCGQ_YR2000_CUST_USE, 
	INF_ACTION, 
	INF_TIMESTAMP, 
	LOGICAL_FLAG, 
	EXTRACT_DATE AS EXTRACT_DATE, 
	AS_OF_DATE AS AS_OF_DATE, 
	RECORD_COUNT AS RECORD_COUNT, 
	SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID AS SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID, 
	AUDIT_ID_OP AS AUDIT_ID
	FROM EXP_arch_PIF_42GQ_WC2_stage
),
